00029 /*
00030  * lustre/mdt/mdt_hsm.c
00031  *
00032  * Lustre Metadata Target (mdt) request handler
00033  *
00034  * Author: Aurelien Degremont <aurelien.degremont@cea.fr>
00035  * Author: JC Lafoucriere <jacques-charles.lafoucriere@cea.fr>
00036  */
00037 
00038 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00039 
00040 #include "mdt_internal.h"
00041 
00042 /* Max allocation to satisfy single HSM RPC. */
00043 #define MDT_HSM_ALLOC_MAX (1 << 20)
00044 
00045 #define MDT_HSM_ALLOC(ptr, size)                        \
00046         do {                                            \
00047                 if ((size) <= MDT_HSM_ALLOC_MAX)        \
00048                         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE((ptr), (size)); \
00049                 else                                    \
00050                         (ptr) = NULL;                   \
00051         } while (0)
00052 
00053 #define MDT_HSM_FREE(ptr, size) OBD_FREE_LARGE((ptr), (size))
00054 
00058 int mdt_hsm_attr_set(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *obj,
00059                      const struct md_hsm *mh)
00060 {
00061         struct md_object        *next = mdt_object_child(obj);
00062         struct lu_buf           *buf = &info->mti_buf;
00063         struct hsm_attrs        *attrs;
00064         int                      rc;
00065         ENTRY;
00066 
00067         attrs = (struct hsm_attrs *)info->mti_xattr_buf;
00068         CLASSERT(sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf) >= sizeof(*attrs));
00069 
00070         /* pack HSM attributes */
00071         lustre_hsm2buf(info->mti_xattr_buf, mh);
00072 
00073         /* update HSM attributes */
00074         buf->lb_buf = attrs;
00075         buf->lb_len = sizeof(*attrs);
00076         rc = mo_xattr_set(info->mti_env, next, buf, XATTR_NAME_HSM, 0);
00077 
00078         RETURN(rc);
00079 }
00080 
00081 static inline bool mdt_hsm_is_admin(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00082 {
00083         bool is_admin;
00084         int rc;
00085 
00086         if (info->mti_body == NULL)
00087                 return false;
00088 
00089         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, (struct mdt_body *)info->mti_body);
00090         if (rc < 0)
00091                 return false;
00092 
00093         is_admin = md_capable(mdt_ucred(info), CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN);
00094 
00095         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00096 
00097         return is_admin;
00098 }
00099 
00108 int mdt_hsm_progress(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00109 {
00110         struct mdt_thread_info          *info;
00111         struct hsm_progress_kernel      *hpk;
00112         int                              rc;
00113         ENTRY;
00114 
00115         if (tsi->tsi_mdt_body == NULL)
00116                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00117 
00118         hpk = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_MDS_HSM_PROGRESS);
00119         if (hpk == NULL)
00120                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
00121 
00122         hpk->hpk_errval = lustre_errno_ntoh(hpk->hpk_errval);
00123 
00124         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Progress on "DFID": len="LPU64" err=%d\n",
00125                PFID(&hpk->hpk_fid), hpk->hpk_extent.length, hpk->hpk_errval);
00126 
00127         if (hpk->hpk_errval)
00128                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Copytool progress on "DFID" failed (%d); %s.\n",
00129                        PFID(&hpk->hpk_fid), hpk->hpk_errval,
00130                        hpk->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_RETRY ? "will retry" : "fatal");
00131 
00132         if (hpk->hpk_flags & HP_FLAG_COMPLETED)
00133                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Finished "DFID" (%d) cancel cookie="LPX64"\n",
00134                        PFID(&hpk->hpk_fid), hpk->hpk_errval, hpk->hpk_cookie);
00135 
00136         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00137         if (!mdt_hsm_is_admin(info))
00138                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00139 
00140         rc = mdt_hsm_coordinator_update(info, hpk);
00141 out:
00142         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00143         RETURN(rc);
00144 }
00145 
00146 int mdt_hsm_ct_register(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00147 {
00148         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
00149         __u32                   *archives;
00150         int                      rc;
00151         ENTRY;
00152 
00153         archives = req_capsule_client_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_MDS_HSM_ARCHIVE);
00154         if (archives == NULL)
00155                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
00156 
00157         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00158         if (!mdt_hsm_is_admin(info))
00159                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00160 
00161         /* XXX: directly include this function here? */
00162         rc = mdt_hsm_agent_register_mask(info, &tsi->tsi_exp->exp_client_uuid,
00163                                          *archives);
00164 out:
00165         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00166         RETURN(rc);
00167 }
00168 
00169 int mdt_hsm_ct_unregister(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00170 {
00171         struct mdt_thread_info  *info;
00172         int                      rc;
00173         ENTRY;
00174 
00175         if (tsi->tsi_mdt_body == NULL)
00176                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00177 
00178         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00179         if (!mdt_hsm_is_admin(info))
00180                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
00181 
00182         /* XXX: directly include this function here? */
00183         rc = mdt_hsm_agent_unregister(info, &tsi->tsi_exp->exp_client_uuid);
00184 out:
00185         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00186         RETURN(rc);
00187 }

00197 int mdt_hsm_state_get(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00198 {
00199         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00200         struct mdt_object       *obj = info->mti_object;
00201         struct md_attr          *ma  = &info->mti_attr;
00202         struct hsm_user_state   *hus;
00203         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00204         int                      rc;
00205         ENTRY;
00206 
00207         if (info->mti_body == NULL || obj == NULL)
00208                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00209 
00210         /* Only valid if client is remote */
00211         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, (struct mdt_body *)info->mti_body);
00212         if (rc < 0)
00213                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00214 
00215         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
00216         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_PR);
00217         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, obj, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
00218         if (rc < 0)
00219                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc);
00220 
00221         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00222         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
00223         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, obj, ma);
00224         if (rc)
00225                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00226 
00227         hus = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill, &RMF_HSM_USER_STATE);
00228         if (hus == NULL)
00229                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EPROTO);
00230 
00231         /* Current HSM flags */
00232         hus->hus_states = ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags;
00233         hus->hus_archive_id = ma->ma_hsm.mh_arch_id;
00234 
00235         EXIT;
00236 out_unlock:
00237         mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, lh, 1);
00238 out_ucred:
00239         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00240 out:
00241         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00242         return rc;
00243 }
00244 
00254 int mdt_hsm_state_set(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00255 {
00256         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00257         struct mdt_object       *obj = info->mti_object;
00258         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00259         struct hsm_state_set    *hss;
00260         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
00261         int                      rc;
00262         __u64                    flags;
00263         ENTRY;
00264 
00265         hss = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_HSM_STATE_SET);
00266 
00267         if (info->mti_body == NULL || obj == NULL || hss == NULL)
00268                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00269 
00270         /* Only valid if client is remote */
00271         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, (struct mdt_body *)info->mti_body);
00272         if (rc < 0)
00273                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00274 
00275         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_CHILD];
00276         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_PW);
00277         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, obj, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP |
00278                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
00279         if (rc < 0)
00280                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc);
00281 
00282         /* Detect out-of range masks */
00283         if ((hss->hss_setmask | hss->hss_clearmask) & ~HSM_FLAGS_MASK) {
00284                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Incompatible masks provided (set "LPX64
00285                        ", clear "LPX64") vs supported set (%#x).\n",
00286                        hss->hss_setmask, hss->hss_clearmask, HSM_FLAGS_MASK);
00287                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
00288         }
00289 
00290         /* Non-root users are forbidden to set or clear flags which are
00291          * NOT defined in HSM_USER_MASK. */
00292         if (((hss->hss_setmask | hss->hss_clearmask) & ~HSM_USER_MASK) &&
00293             !md_capable(mdt_ucred(info), CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN)) {
00294                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Incompatible masks provided (set "LPX64
00295                        ", clear "LPX64") vs unprivileged set (%#x).\n",
00296                        hss->hss_setmask, hss->hss_clearmask, HSM_USER_MASK);
00297                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EPERM);
00298         }
00299 
00300         /* Read current HSM info */
00301         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00302         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
00303         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, obj, ma);
00304         if (rc)
00305                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00306 
00307         /* Change HSM flags depending on provided masks */
00308         if (hss->hss_valid & HSS_SETMASK)
00309                 ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags |= hss->hss_setmask;
00310         if (hss->hss_valid & HSS_CLEARMASK)
00311                 ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags &= ~hss->hss_clearmask;
00312 
00313         /* Change archive_id if provided. */
00314         if (hss->hss_valid & HSS_ARCHIVE_ID) {
00315                 if (!(ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & HS_EXISTS)) {
00316                         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Could not set an archive number for "
00317                                DFID "if HSM EXISTS flag is not set.\n",
00318                                PFID(&info->mti_body->mbo_fid1));
00319                         GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 /* Detect out-of range archive id */
00323                 if (hss->hss_archive_id > LL_HSM_MAX_ARCHIVE) {
00324                         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "archive id %u exceeds maximum %zu.\n",
00325                                hss->hss_archive_id, LL_HSM_MAX_ARCHIVE);
00326                         GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
00327                 }
00328 
00329                 ma->ma_hsm.mh_arch_id = hss->hss_archive_id;
00330         }
00331 
00332         /* Check for inconsistant HSM flagset.
00333          * DIRTY without EXISTS: no dirty if no archive was created.
00334          * DIRTY and RELEASED: a dirty file could not be released.
00335          * RELEASED without ARCHIVED: do not release a non-archived file.
00336          * LOST without ARCHIVED: cannot lost a non-archived file.
00337          */
00338         flags = ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags;
00339         if ((flags & HS_DIRTY    && !(flags & HS_EXISTS)) ||
00340             (flags & HS_RELEASED && flags & HS_DIRTY) ||
00341             (flags & HS_RELEASED && !(flags & HS_ARCHIVED)) ||
00342             (flags & HS_LOST     && !(flags & HS_ARCHIVED))) {
00343                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "Incompatible flag change on "DFID
00344                               "flags="LPX64"\n",
00345                        PFID(&info->mti_body->mbo_fid1), flags);
00346                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
00347         }
00348 
00349         /* Save the modified flags */
00350         rc = mdt_hsm_attr_set(info, obj, &ma->ma_hsm);
00351         if (rc)
00352                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
00353 
00354         EXIT;
00355 
00356 out_unlock:
00357         mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, lh, 1);
00358 out_ucred:
00359         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00360 out:
00361         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00362         return rc;
00363 }
00364 
00371 int mdt_hsm_action(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00372 {
00373         struct mdt_thread_info          *info;
00374         struct hsm_current_action       *hca;
00375         struct hsm_action_list          *hal = NULL;
00376         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00377         int                              hal_size;
00378         int                              rc;
00379         ENTRY;
00380 
00381         hca = req_capsule_server_get(tsi->tsi_pill,
00382                                      &RMF_MDS_HSM_CURRENT_ACTION);
00383         if (hca == NULL)
00384                 RETURN(err_serious(-EPROTO));
00385 
00386         if (tsi->tsi_mdt_body == NULL)
00387                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00388 
00389         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00390         /* Only valid if client is remote */
00391         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, (struct mdt_body *)info->mti_body);
00392         if (rc)
00393                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
00394 
00395         /* Coordinator information */
00396         hal_size = sizeof(*hal) +
00397                    cfs_size_round(MTI_NAME_MAXLEN) /* fsname */ +
00398                    cfs_size_round(sizeof(*hai));
00399 
00400         MDT_HSM_ALLOC(hal, hal_size);
00401         if (hal == NULL)
00402                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = -ENOMEM);
00403 
00404         hal->hal_version = HAL_VERSION;
00405         hal->hal_archive_id = 0;
00406         hal->hal_flags = 0;
00407         obd_uuid2fsname(hal->hal_fsname, mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00408                         MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00409         hal->hal_count = 1;
00410         hai = hai_first(hal);
00411         hai->hai_action = HSMA_NONE;
00412         hai->hai_cookie = 0;
00413         hai->hai_gid = 0;
00414         hai->hai_fid = info->mti_body->mbo_fid1;
00415         hai->hai_len = sizeof(*hai);
00416 
00417         rc = mdt_hsm_get_actions(info, hal);
00418         if (rc)
00419                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
00420 
00421         /* cookie is used to give back request status */
00422         if (hai->hai_cookie == 0)
00423                 hca->hca_state = HPS_WAITING;
00424         else
00425                 hca->hca_state = HPS_RUNNING;
00426 
00427         switch (hai->hai_action) {
00428         case HSMA_NONE:
00429                 hca->hca_action = HUA_NONE;
00430                 break;
00431         case HSMA_ARCHIVE:
00432                 hca->hca_action = HUA_ARCHIVE;
00433                 break;
00434         case HSMA_RESTORE:
00435                 hca->hca_action = HUA_RESTORE;
00436                 break;
00437         case HSMA_REMOVE:
00438                 hca->hca_action = HUA_REMOVE;
00439                 break;
00440         case HSMA_CANCEL:
00441                 hca->hca_action = HUA_CANCEL;
00442                 break;
00443         default:
00444                 hca->hca_action = HUA_NONE;
00445                 CERROR("%s: Unknown hsm action: %d on "DFID"\n",
00446                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00447                        hai->hai_action, PFID(&hai->hai_fid));
00448                 break;
00449         }
00450 
00451         hca->hca_location = hai->hai_extent;
00452 
00453         EXIT;
00454 out_free:
00455         MDT_HSM_FREE(hal, hal_size);
00456 out_ucred:
00457         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00458 out:
00459         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00460         return rc;
00461 }
00462 
00471 int mdt_hsm_request(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
00472 {
00473         struct mdt_thread_info          *info;
00474         struct req_capsule              *pill = tsi->tsi_pill;
00475         struct hsm_request              *hr;
00476         struct hsm_user_item            *hui;
00477         struct hsm_action_list          *hal;
00478         struct hsm_action_item          *hai;
00479         const void                      *data;
00480         int                              hui_list_size;
00481         int                              data_size;
00482         enum hsm_copytool_action         action = HSMA_NONE;
00483         __u64                            compound_id;
00484         int                              hal_size, i, rc;
00485         ENTRY;
00486 
00487         hr = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_MDS_HSM_REQUEST);
00488         hui = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_MDS_HSM_USER_ITEM);
00489         data = req_capsule_client_get(pill, &RMF_GENERIC_DATA);
00490 
00491         if (tsi->tsi_mdt_body == NULL || hr == NULL || hui == NULL || data == NULL)
00492                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00493 
00494         /* Sanity check. Nothing to do with an empty list */
00495         if (hr->hr_itemcount == 0)
00496                 RETURN(0);
00497 
00498         hui_list_size = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_MDS_HSM_USER_ITEM,
00499                                              RCL_CLIENT);
00500         if (hui_list_size < hr->hr_itemcount * sizeof(*hui))
00501                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00502 
00503         data_size = req_capsule_get_size(pill, &RMF_GENERIC_DATA, RCL_CLIENT);
00504         if (data_size != hr->hr_data_len)
00505                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00506 
00507         info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
00508         /* Only valid if client is remote */
00509         rc = mdt_init_ucred(info, (struct mdt_body *)info->mti_body);
00510         if (rc)
00511                 GOTO(out, rc);
00512 
00513         switch (hr->hr_action) {
00514         /* code to be removed in hsm1_merge and final patch */
00515         case HUA_RELEASE:
00516                 CERROR("Release action is not working in hsm1_coord\n");
00517                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = -EINVAL);
00518                 break;
00519         /* end of code to be removed */
00520         case HUA_ARCHIVE:
00521                 action = HSMA_ARCHIVE;
00522                 break;
00523         case HUA_RESTORE:
00524                 action = HSMA_RESTORE;
00525                 break;
00526         case HUA_REMOVE:
00527                 action = HSMA_REMOVE;
00528                 break;
00529         case HUA_CANCEL:
00530                 action = HSMA_CANCEL;
00531                 break;
00532         default:
00533                 CERROR("Unknown hsm action: %d\n", hr->hr_action);
00534                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = -EINVAL);
00535         }
00536 
00537         hal_size = sizeof(*hal) + cfs_size_round(MTI_NAME_MAXLEN) /* fsname */ +
00538                    (sizeof(*hai) + cfs_size_round(hr->hr_data_len)) *
00539                    hr->hr_itemcount;
00540 
00541         MDT_HSM_ALLOC(hal, hal_size);
00542         if (hal == NULL)
00543                 GOTO(out_ucred, rc = -ENOMEM);
00544 
00545         hal->hal_version = HAL_VERSION;
00546         hal->hal_archive_id = hr->hr_archive_id;
00547         hal->hal_flags = hr->hr_flags;
00548         obd_uuid2fsname(hal->hal_fsname, mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
00549                         MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
00550 
00551         hal->hal_count = hr->hr_itemcount;
00552         hai = hai_first(hal);
00553         for (i = 0; i < hr->hr_itemcount; i++, hai = hai_next(hai)) {
00554                 hai->hai_action = action;
00555                 hai->hai_cookie = 0;
00556                 hai->hai_gid = 0;
00557                 hai->hai_fid = hui[i].hui_fid;
00558                 hai->hai_extent = hui[i].hui_extent;
00559                 memcpy(hai->hai_data, data, hr->hr_data_len);
00560                 hai->hai_len = sizeof(*hai) + hr->hr_data_len;
00561         }
00562 
00563         rc = mdt_hsm_add_actions(info, hal, &compound_id);
00564 
00565         MDT_HSM_FREE(hal, hal_size);
00566 
00567         GOTO(out_ucred, rc);
00568 
00569 out_ucred:
00570         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
00571 out:
00572         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
00573         return rc;
00574 }
